title: Shots Fired
body:
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BwdmeKjIAAAyT1f.jpg
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BwdmeP5CIAAh8cR.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/3HnJg43.gif

I know who the artist is but can't remember the name of said artist :/ be nice if google image search didn't suck :/

replies.body: I was half expecting another slide where shyvanna turned back human and ran away and just locked herself in her room.
http://t03.deviantart.net/LkriBCGwubIJxhVHRw2ZMbCA7PE=/fit-in/300x900/filters:no_upscale():origin()/pre06/7f3c/th/pre/f/2014/340/8/3/untitled_by_saukra13sasukelover-d88wjm2.jpg
I don't know why Shyvana acting like a moody teen's so funny but this really made me Hue.
Anything big acting like a moody teen is funny. Betcha Morde would also be comical, but im sure he'd NEVER do thaaaaaat...
Of course he wouldn't... F...Fool!

{{champion:98}}pai tends to make people stutter like that.

Wait, what were we talking about again?
Something about Morde's Diar... I mean journal.
I just imagined Mordekaiser with a quill and reading glasses writing in a tiny journal.

"Dear Dia... Journal

I saw that Sona girl walk down this street this morning, she looked so cute... I wish I had the nerve to talk to her, but dont you tell anyone else id have to crack your skull open..."

And now I'm thinking of Ginny and Tom Riddle...

It's Huerry Potter...
To the sketch board!
[http://i1166.photobucket.com/albums/q619/Wgni/journal_zpsrylvfhhk.png](http://i1166.photobucket.com/albums/q619/Wgni/journal_zpsrylvfhhk.png)

For a drawin' board, any scene of Rule 63 Mordekaiser makes me think of...

http://images-cdn.9gag.com/photo/adpe8ZB_700b.jpg

HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE-HUE

MORD-AYYY!
http://bdn.i.ntere.st/p/10941597/image
B-baka!

{{champion:59}} "Shyvana, you look distraught. What happened to you?"

{{champion:102}} ". .. . It was Katarina."

{{champion:59}} "The assassin? Did she harm you in anyway? Did she pry answers from you by force??"

{{champion:102}} "She, she ... *sniff* ."

{{champion:59}} "I swear on my honor, if she so much as tore a scale from your hide-"

{{champion:102}} "_SHE SAID I ROAR AT YOU WHEN WE'RE IN BED!!_"

{{champion:59}} "... ... .. what? ... I .. mmh, this is, unspeakably awkward."

{{champion:102}} "I-is it really that humiliating ... t-to have me d-do that in bed..?"

{{champion:59}} "Not in the slightest. It's only awkward because Katarina found out about my fetish."

{{champion:102}} " ... o////o"
I guess you could say she got...burned.
Meph, he is probably into that kinky shit.

Looks like that's art from ShiNaa on DA. She a lot of art pertaining to Kat and Talon.
http://shinaa.deviantart.com

Yep, it's her.
Found it: http://a-sneaky-red-head.tumblr.com/post/96003019595/there-is-nothing-to-add-really-among-all-the
The artist is [HolyElfGirl](http://holyelfgirl.deviantart.com/)
Katarina, confirmed savage.

well done sir/ma'm well done
